title: Development of metaproteomics for in situ investigation of microbial activity both in vivo and in soil and faeces
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: New method just published in ISMEJ 2014 and now available for use Agriculture, Food and Drink Economic
findingsText: Novel method of extracting proteins from communities in faeces and soil Many scientists can now use this method to discover activities in situ and attribute function and affiliation to the proteins identified. Agriculture, Food and Drink,Environment,Healthcare
